Articles.Content:
If you require a simple to fly spaceplane for performing crew changeovers in your Kerbin spacestations, this could be the craft for you.  Capable of reaching a tested 250km orbit, possibly higher (no guarantee offered above 250km) it has the ability to carry up to 10 Kerbals to relieve those hardworking Kerbonauts whizzing along above the planet's surface.

Action group keys and basic pilot notes can be found on the Kerbal X page, from where you can download the craft.

https://kerbalx.com/Scarecrow88/LKO-Crew-X
